Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to normal retirement age for police/fire members of the New York city fire department pension fund
Summary: Provides that the normal service retirement benefit for police/fire members who are members of the New York city fire department pension fund shall be paid to such members of the New York city fire department pension fund without regard to age upon retirement after twenty years of service.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to normal retirement age for police/fire members of the New York city fire department pension fund
